```{r, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(googlesheets4)

sips <- googlesheets4::sheets_read("1G_SoWUquak6oD-b2L3L-XB7cF97UAGb8PPyVg3r0Lts", col_names = FALSE)

read_row <- function(row) {
  hm <- sips[[row, 1]]
  time <- paste0("### ", hour(hm), ":", minute(hm), "\n\n")
  
  sessions <- sips[row, 2:25] %>%
    unlist() %>%
    unname()
  
  sessions <- sessions[!is.na(sessions)] %>%
    paste0(collapse = "</li>\n\n<li><input type='checkbox'> ") %>%
    paste0("<ul><li><input type='checkbox'> ", ., "</li></ul>")
  
  paste(time, sessions)
}

```
